ubuntu change locale

2016-08-14

# File generated by update-locale
LANG=en_US.UTF-8
#LC_NUMERIC=”lzh_TW”
#LC_TIME=”lzh_TW”
#LC_MONETARY=”lzh_TW”
#LC_PAPER=”lzh_TW”
#LC_NAME=”lzh_TW”
#LC_ADDRESS=”lzh_TW”
#LC_TELEPHONE=”lzh_TW”
#LC_MEASUREMENT=”lzh_TW”
#LC_IDENTIFICATION=”lzh_TW”
LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8

改回繁體中文 zh_TW

改完重新登入後才有效果
